feed.title: North East Margaree - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , North East Margaree
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:21 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , North East Margaree
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:21 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 7.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North East Margaree 02:00 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023
Temperature: 7.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: 6.9°C
Wind: SSE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Temperature rising to 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Fog patches. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 130 from Margaree Harbour to Bay St. Lawrence late this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming south 40 gusting to 70 after midnight. Temperature rising to 10 by morning. Forecast issued 10:16 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. Temperature steady near 10.
entry.summary: Rain. Fog patches. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near 10. Forecast issued 10:16 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain except freezing rain over higher terrain overnight. Fog patches dissipating in the evening. Amount 5 mm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 10:16 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023
